```{r setup, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(kableExtra)

website_path <- here()

source(file.path(website_path, "data_prep.R"))
```

```{r books, echo = FALSE}
whiskeys <- load_and_prepare_data(file.path(website_path, "_data", "whiskeys.csv"))
whiskeys %>%
  kbl() %>% 
  kable_material(c("striped", "hover", "responsive")) %>% 
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = TRUE)
```
